item2.description:
Reduce Soil Compaction,
Higher Working Speed

item5.description:
Easy-to-use repairs kits. No previous experience required. 
Less machine downtime. Reduced maintenance costs.

item6.description:
The stability and durability of our boom make it ideal for 
Smart Spot Spraying Systems across the entire working width.

item1.label: Stability
item1.content: Effective weight distribution, centralizing mass near the machine. This improves the boom's dynamics and stability on uneven terrain, allowing faster operation.

item2.label: Repairability
item2.content: The repair kit allows for fast and straightforward application in the field, eliminating the need for special tools or prior experience.

item3.label: Quality
item3.content: Automated manufacturing processes enable enhanced repeatability and superior material properties.

item4.label: Modularity
item4.content: Allows the quick and easy integration of technology and accessories. This modular design is achieved through the combination of carbon fiber with other metals and materials, achieving a simple, lightweight, and efficient design.

item1.compatible:
Compatible with: 
Machines from 210 cm gauge.
item1.description: Ideal for replacing 21 to 28 m steel booms, supports selective application systems across the entire working width.

item2.compatible:
Compatible with: 
Machines from 260 cm gauge
item2.description: Supports selective application systems across the entire working width.

item3.description: Supports selective application systems across the entire working width.

item4.compatible:
For top of the range sprayers and use in large fields. Compatible with 
the same adaptations as the 48M boom.

item5.compatible:
For use in large extensions. Compatible with 
the same adaptations as the 44M Boom.

repairability.title: Repairability
repairability.description: The repair kit allows for fast and straightforward application in the field, eliminating the need for special tools or prior experience.

slide1.description: The stability and resistance of our boom makes it suitable for the use of Smart Spot Spraying Systems across the entire working width, maintaining good stability and ensuring optimum application.

slide2.description: The stability and resistance of our boom makes it suitable for the use of Smart Spot Spraying Systems across the entire working width, maintaining good stability and ensuring optimum application.

slide3.description: Our mounting brackets combine design and engineering with the best materials to achieve a lightweight and durable product, enabling precise spraying and maximizing performance. This results in cost savings, increased  productivity, and reduced environmental impact.

item1.opinion: Switching from the 32 meter steel boom to the BK40M not only means 25% more productivity, but it also means saving fuel; it even allows me to go much faster, and most importantly... to get home earlier to enjoy my family.
item1.user: Ariel Savorgnano, Córdoba, Argentina, Owner of Two Massey Ferguson Sprayers with BK40M Booms

item2.opinion: The BK36m boom, with its rigidity and low weight, allowed us to install the Weed-IT Quadro system across the entire working width. Its exceptional stability ensures optimum performance and contributes to the durability of the sprayer.
item2.user: Martin Magno, Agrogenerales S.A., Necochea, Argentina, Caiman SP with BK36M Full Weed-IT Quadro.

item3.opinion: In Brazil we use very corrosive products, and we are particularly surprised by the resistance shown by the boom (even after two years of usage), as well as its low weight and stability.

ourVision.title: Our Vision
ourVision.description:
We seek to revolutionize the agricultural machinery industry by incorporating advanced composite 
materials that provide a leap in EFFICIENCY.

aboutUsPie.title: World-class, experienced, multi-award winning team with a global mindset.
aboutUsPie.subtitle: Agricultural machinery designers and engineers experts in composite materials.

footer.lineTop: For more information, click on the link below.
footer.aboutIinfo: BK Comp is a company that develops and manufactures advanced composite products for the agribusiness, combining design and Know How in different technologies aiming to increase the efficiency and productivity of the sector.
